about_the_game:
Bear the colours of Ultramarines Successor Chapters with the Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack!

This DLC contains more than 30 cosmetic items and options including chapter heraldry for the left and right pauldrons, unique helmets, knee markings and colour packs for 12 Ultramarines Successor Chapters:

Doom Eagles

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Leadbelcher (metal) colour

• Stormhost Silver (metal) colour

• Ultramarines Right Greave marking

Genesis Chapter

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Evil Sunz Scarlet colour

• Gehenna’s Gold (metal) colour

Libators

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Zamesi Desert colour

• Ultramarines Right Greave marking

Novamarines

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Ushabti Bone colour

• Novamarines Left Greave marking

• Novamarines Right Greave marking

Praetors of Orpheus

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Lothern Blue colour

• Lieutenant helmet

Scythes of the Emperor

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Dark Reaper colour

• Ultramarines Sergeant Left Greave marking

Iron Hounds

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Helmet mask pattern

• Ultramarines Sergeant Right Greave marking

Tome Keepers

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Right Pauldron Lieutenant marking

• Damnos Wars Veteran Right Greave marking

Void Tridents

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Kantor Blue colour

• Hashut Copper (metal) colour

Castellans of the Rift

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Incubi Darkness colour

• Ultramarines helmet

Brazen Consuls

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Deathclaw Brown (metal) colour

• Brazen Consuls helmet

Hawk Lords

• Left Pauldron Chapter Heraldry

• Phoenician Purple colour

• Fulgurite Copper (metal) colour

• Veteran Right Greave marking

The Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack is available as part of the Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine Season Pass.

Purchasing this DLC makes its content unlockable in the customization menu. You can unlock its associated content with requisition points obtained in PvP and PvE modes.

short_description: Bear the colours of the Ultramarines Successor Chapters with the Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack! This DLC contains more than 30 cosmetic items and options from 12 Ultramarines chapters.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Czech, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
